title: One Piece Movie 2: Clockwork Island Adventure
alternative_title: One Piece Movie 2: Nejimaki-jima no Daibouken, ワンピース ねじまき島の冒険
description: Not only was their ship stolen, but Nami too! In order to get them back, Luffy and his pirate crew meet the mysterious Trump Brothers Borodo and Akisu, who lead them towards clockwork island, a city dictated by a band of ruthless card-pirates! High adventure ensues as the Straw Hat pirate crew take back what is rightfully theirs.
